claims.text: The FBI was organizing the riots of January 6th.
claims.context: Discussion about the January 6th Capitol riots and FBI involvement.

claim_reports.claim_text: The FBI was organizing the riots of January 6th.
claim_reports.verdict_summary: The evidence from multiple high-reliability sources, including official statements and reports, clearly indicates that the FBI did not organize or direct the January 6th riots. Instead, it highlights the FBI's role in monitoring threats and countering violent extremism, with no authorization for its agents or sources to engage in illegal activities during the events.

refutes.title: [PDF] STATEMENT OF FACTS I, am a Special Agent with the Federal ...
refutes.evidence_summary: The evidence discusses the FBI's role in monitoring and responding to threats leading up to and during the January 6 events, but it does not support the claim that the FBI was organizing the riots. Instead, it emphasizes the FBI's efforts to counter violent extremism and protect democratic processes.
refutes.snippet: Restrictions around the. U.S. Capitol include permanent and temporary security barriers and posts manned by U.S. Capitol. Police. Only authorized people with ...

refutes.title: DOJ OIG Releases Report on the FBI's Handling of Its Confidential ...
refutes.evidence_summary: The evidence indicates that the FBI did not organize or direct the riots on January 6th, as none of its confidential human sources were authorized to enter the Capitol or engage in illegal activities. This directly contradicts the claim that the FBI was organizing the riots.
refutes.snippet: ... role. The FBI Did Not Canvass Field Offices for Intelligence ... No Undercover FBI Employees at Protests or at the Capitol on January 6.

refutes.title: [PDF] FBI did not send undercover operatives to join Jan. 6 attack ...
refutes.evidence_summary: The evidence indicates that the FBI did not authorize any of its confidential human sources to enter the Capitol or engage in illegal activities during the January 6th riots, directly contradicting the claim that the FBI was organizing the riots.
refutes.snippet: The FBI has long denied having any involvement by its own staff or its informants in the riots at the Capitol, though conspiracy theories about ...

transcript_data.text: according to this i have to say remarkable piece that you just put up late last night read it in bed at midnight that the fbi was organizing the riots of january 6th well yes it certainly suggests that possibility and i'm hearing from people that this is the most important and the darkest investigative piece they've seen in years but the american people deserve the truth about 1-6 not just for the sake of ashley babbitt not just for the sake of the hundreds of people held in prison unjustly as a violation of human rights but for the sake of the 70 plus million people who are trump supporters or just against the corrupt ruling class who have effectively been labeled de facto domestic extremists by our own government and i believe the key that unlocks the truth to 1-6 is the following question to what extent were the main militia groups imputed to the 1-6 so-called capital siege to what extent was their infiltration of those groups by undercover agents or informants and to what extent when we see the unindicted co-conspirators who occupy senior positions in those groups to what extent are those people being spared prosecution on account of a prior relationship with the federal government those two questions create a thread and when we pull that thread the ugly truth of that event and perhaps even the country we live in will be exposed i gotta ask because it it may answer one of the great mysteries is this i think there are 14 000 hours of unreleased video footage from that day the administration is hiding from us do you think this is why i think that's certainly a possibility um it's it's extremely suspicious even going back to this so-called pipe bomber video remember the pipe bomber the capital pipeliner the fbi has been extremely suspicious in withholding evidence video evidence that could help and identify this bomber which presumably they want to do but if you may i'd like to make a general point and it really after seeing all this you have to ask yourself does the national security apparatus do anything but conspire against the american people i'm led to conclude that we cannot have a democracy everything in our politics will be fake and performative until we bring the national security state including the fbi to heal it's not a left issue it's not a right issue every politician who cares about our country should demand a church committee 2.0 immediately and people of good faith on the left should join it uh immediately darren b i appreciate your coming on signing the work you do at revolver.news thank you
